lead_paragraph: CONNORS--Gerald Martin. Born November 10, 1927 in Manhattan, died May 25, 2016 in Sleepy Hollow, NY. Longtime Wall Street Reporter for the New York Daily News. Navy Combat Veteran WWII, Destroyer Escort USS Naifeh; Korea, fireman, battleship USS New Jersey. Survived by his wife, Elizabeth K. Flynn; their children, Andrew Tait (Erica), Kathryn E., Elizabeth M. (Mark Fogle), and grandson Everett Gerald He also had three children from his first marriage: Jonathan M. (Maria), Jennifer Dillon (John), and Anthony B., and five more grandsons. Wake, 4pm-8pm Monday, Coffey Funeral Home, Tarrytown; Mass, 11am, Tuesday, St. Teresa of Avila Church, Sleepy Hollow; Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery in Valhalla NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CONNORS, GERALD MARTIN
